price: 14. Waxaa naga mid ah kuwo 'Alle u' hoggaansan (Muslimiin ah), iyo kuwo xadgudba; qofkii u hoggaansama (Alle), kuwaasi waxay raacaan hanuun toosan.
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-mus'limūna waminnā al-qāsiṭūna faman aslama fa-ulāika taḥarraw rashadan
